alignleft srcsitecontentjpgtd tdfont faceVerdana Arial Helvetica sansserif size GTECHPro is an electronic Performance Meter for automobiles Its designed to make a professional test driver out of anybody All you have to do is plug it in a cigarette lighter mount it to the windshield and start accelerating GTECHPro does the rest automatically and displays the results Its a great way to get performance and safety information about you car br br The heart of the GTECHPro is a precision silicon accelerometer An accelerometer is a sensor that measures acceleration also known as GForce br br
